price: E, nela, fizemos assentes montanhas altíssimas, e demo-vos de beber água sápida?
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
